QuestData.Title: Breaking the Keystone
QuestData.Description: Opening the Stones of Binding loosened much of my confinement, but a lock still holds me chained. It is the Keystone you see among this circle of stones. And the key is held by one of my captors, the stone watcher Fozruk.$B$BYou must obtain that key, which the stone watchers call the Rod of Order, from Fozruk and use it to open the Keystone.$B$B$n, you have done so much to aid me. Just a little more...and my gratitude will shake the very foundations of the earth!
QuestData.LogDescription: Obtain the Rod of Order from Fozruk.
QuestData.CompletionText: The Keystone is charged with tremendous geomantic energy.
QuestData.RewardText: You place the rod in the keystone. And a shudder is felt beneath you...
